ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on the dark of the night
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:0.5_0: The training rule on taking leave of an available monk
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.2_0: At that time a certain nun was associating with a family from which she received a regular meal.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.3_0: Then, after robing up one morning, she took her bowl and robe and went to that family.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.3_1: She sat down on a seat and then departed without taking leave of the owners.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.4_0: While the family was being appointed to that family, they shared out that seat in that family.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.5_0: Not seeing the seat, the people there asked that nun,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.8_0: “Give back the seat, Venerable.” And after scolding her, they made an end of her regular meal.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.9_0: Then, while those people were cleaning the house, they saw that seat in between those vessels. They asked that nun for forgiveness and restored her regular meal.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.10_0: She told the nuns what had happened,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.11_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.12_0: “How can a nun visit a family before the meal, sit down on a seat, and then depart without taking leave of the owners?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.13_0: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.16_0: “... How can a nun act like this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.17_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.18_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:1.19.1_0: ‘If a nun visits families before the meal, sits down on a seat, and then departs without taking leave of the owners, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.1.8_0: there are four kinds of family: the aristocratic family, the brahmin family, the merchant family, the worker family.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.1.12_0: a luxurious couch is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.1.15_0: Departs without taking leave of the owners:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.1.16_0: if, without taking leave of a person who understands in that family, she goes beyond the roof cover of that house, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.1.17_0: If it is out in the open and she goes beyond the vicinity of the seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.2.1_0: If she has not taken leave, and she does not perceive that she has, and she departs, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.2.2_0: If she has not taken leave, but she is unsure of it, and she departs, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.2.3_0: If she has not taken leave, but she perceives that she has, and she departs, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.2.4_0: If she has not been expelled, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.2.5_0: If she has taken leave, but she does not perceive that she has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.2.6_0: If she has taken leave, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.2.7_0: If she has taken leave, and she perceives that she has, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.3.2_0: if she departs after taking leave;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.3.3_0: if the seat is not movable;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.3.5_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.3.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc15:2.3.8_0: The fifth rule, the training rule on fifth, is finished.
